alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ellis and southern Dallas Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Desoto, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Grand Prairie, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Seagoville, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Hutchins, Cockrell Hill, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Palmer, Combine and Oak Leaf. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 403 and 424. Interstate 20 between mile markers 457 and 477. Interstate 30 near mile marker 40. Interstate 45 between mile markers 253 and 280. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
